name: Never Stop Sneakin'
description: The Department of Sneakin' is the world's most elite stealth agency. Your mission: stop time-traveling master criminal Amadeus Guildenstern.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 640M, Radeon HD 5670, or Integrated Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 550 MB available space
